page.title: 08COUNTRYSIDE SURVEY - Waltham
page.content: In 1978 the local Women's Institute carried out a detailed countryside survey in the Waltham-on-the-Wolds area; the western part of area 04800321 was covered by this survey, a copy of which is held by the Leicestershire Museum, Art Galleries & Records Service. The survey covers the history of the Parish, the physical geography of the area, farming patterns including changes in farming techniques and their effect on the landscape and wildlife, the flora and fauna of the area including a detailed map indicating the exact use, including crop type, of every field and parcel of land in the Parish.
